Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to including the promotion and expansion of cricket in the state of New York
Summary: Relates to including the promotion and expansion of cricket in the state of New York and to the authorization of the department of economic development to give a preference to any tourist promotion agency that is promoting the sport of cricket.
LawCode: Amd ยง1004, Gen Bus L (as proposed in S.146 & A.479); amd ยง161, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the jurisdiction of the state athletic commission; and to amend the economic development law, in relation to the authorization of the department of economic development to give a preference to any tourist promotion agency that is promoting the sport of cricket
